billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Increases from 3/4% to 1%, the rate of additional sales and compensating use taxes the county of Essex is authorized to impose
summary: Increases from 3/4% to 1%, the rate of additional sales and compensating use taxes the county of Essex is authorized to impose.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing the county of Essex to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use tax
